name: Mini Sculpt & Pop On-The-Go
about: What it is:u00a0A limited-edition, mini set with a viral, award-winning contour and blush stick to create effortless looks on the go. Ingredient Callouts: These products are cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Create Mariou2019s signature SoftSculpt look effortlessly with a mini, creamy, buildable contour stick that swipes on seamlessly and dries down to a natural-matte finish. Donu2019t forget to add a healthy, radiant flush to your cheeks with the mini cream blush stick, which delivers medium-buildable coverage for a soft pop of color, ideal for all skin types. Both sticks are non-comedogenic and non-pore clogging...The SoftSculpt Cream Contour & Bronzer Stick is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This Set Contains:.Set 1:.- 0.14 oz/ 4g SoftSculpt Cream Contour & Bronzer Stick in Light Medium (understated, cool).- 0.14 oz/ 4 g Soft Pop Cream Blush Stick in Sweet Pink (neutral, soft pink)..Set 2:.- 0.14 oz/ 4g SoftSculpt Cream Contour & Bronzer Stick in Medium (warm, golden).- 0.14 oz/ 4 g Soft Pop Cream Blush Stick in Pale Petal (soft pink)..Set 3:.- 0.14 oz/ 4g SoftSculpt Cream Contour & Bronzer Stick in Dark (neutral, slightly warm).- 0.14 oz/ 4 g Soft Pop Cream Blush Stick in Raspberry (bright pink)
ingredients: SoftSculptu00ae Cream Contour & Bronzer Stick in Light Medium:.Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Mica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ozokerite, Synthetic Wax, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate, Octyldodecanol, Laureth-4, Propylene Carbonate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain/Peut Contenir: [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]...Soft Pop Cream Blush Stick in Sweet Pink:.Octyldodecanol, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Microcrystalline Wax, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. [(+/ -): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..MINI SOFTSCULPTu00ae SHAPING STICK:.Smile softly to find the high point of your cheekbone, then apply the shaping stick along the cheekbone. Donu2019t go too close to your smile line. .To keep the application lifted, tap and blend upwards and outward. .To sculpt or warm up the forehead and jawline, put a little bit of product in the temple area and along the jawline and blend....MINI SOFT POP BLUSH STICK: .Smile softly to find the apples of your cheeks and apply the blush stick to the higher part of the apples towards the hairline. .Gently blend outward toward the hairline for a lifted look..PRO TIP: Dab onto lips for a monochromatic pop of color. ...PRO TIP: Apply & blend with the F1 Brush (sold separately)....How to use: Gently press the stick down into the base and twist to propel formula up. Youu2019re ready to sculpt & pop!

reviews.review_title: Average product: try Rate Beauty instead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to use this product for a bit before I rate it fairly. I think this set is average. The contour stick would not roll up after 2 uses & I had to use a brush. Turns out it gets stuck. TBH I prefer the Rare Beauty contour stick in Happy Sol. The formula is top notch: it glides on the skin & blends beautifully. Not so with the Mario contour. The formula is just too stiff. I was excited to try the blush stick in Pale Petal. The color is gorgeous. I had to apply to my hand and apply to my cheeks. The color is gorgeous. I noticed I had this color already in my collection: Rare Beauty in Happy (mini). I will use these two products until they finish (panned) but I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible product!  Made my skin breakout.  I would NOT recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Dark / Raspberry - neutral, slightly warm / bright pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks I'm not very liking it It's too expensive I don't think it's worth it and it just gives me a Bumpy formula on my face and I don't love it I do not recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on Mario's site and thought it would be bigger. That aside I love it!. They are both creamy and pigmented. it's great for on the go, and in the end, less wasteful. I really love how this blush makes me look more hydrated and alive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received these, they were much smaller than I expected but the product is so pigmented and a little goes a long way. Iu2019m loving this combo and itu2019s wonderful to try it as a mini before purchasing the full size. Blends like butter!

reviews.review_text: I really like this product the only thing is that mine after a couple uses got a bit dirty, and the product is very creamy so it kinda become messy. Otherwise the product is really nice and smooth And I really like it

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for about a week and I love it! It is so worth the price and thereu2019s so much product! A little goes a long way. This product will last so long and itu2019s such a pretty shade!

reviews.review_text: SO SMALL!!!!!! I honestly donu2019t know why this is the price it is itu2019s probably the size of my pinky or smaller.  Disappointing.
